original_text:
Columbus deluxe
Caratteristiche generali
Software: Novomatic
Rulli: 5
Linee di vincita: 10
Puntata min.: 0,2 €
Puntata max.: 20 €
Max. di monete: 1
Vincita massima (Jackpot): 100.000 €
Autoplay: Si
Tema e grafica
Columbus Deluxe rappresenta la versione migliorata della storica slot machine della Novomatic Columbus. Il tema è lo stesso, così come i protagonisti, e si naviga anche qui in un mare di bonus e tesori alla scoperta del Nuovo Mondo.
Ciò che cambia rispetto alla precedente versione è certamente la grafica, che appare qui migliorata e resa più moderna, senza però rinunciare ad alcune caratteristiche che la rendono vicina alla tradizione delle slot machine terrestri, come i simboli che rappresentano le carte dal 9 all’Asso.
Simboli, Bonus e Scatter
I simboli sono incentrati sul tema della scoperta del Nuovo Continente: abbiamo la Regina Isabella di Spagna, le tre caravelle dell’esploratore, ma anche una collana d’oro e l’albero di una nave, nonché le carte da poker dal 9 all’Asso.
L’immagine di Cristoforo Colombo è il simbolo Wild, che non solo sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli, ma se appare dalle due volte in su, offre dei ricchi moltiplicatori, fino ad arrivare al montepremi di 100.000 € se compare cinque volte su una singola payline.
Le Caravelle sono lo Scatter e attivano il Bonus Free Spins; è presente anche la funzione Gamble per tentare il raddoppio della vincita.
Come giocare a Columbus Deluxe
Questa slot machine firmata Novomatic rappresenta un’evoluzione rispetto alla precedente versione anche dal punto di vista delle possibilità di gioco.
I simboli hanno ciascuno un valore diverso, partendo da quelli che offrono la vincita inferiore (le carte da gioco), fino ad arrivare a quelli che pagano di più, rappresentati dalla regina Isabella D’Aragona e da Cristoforo Colombo in persona.
Una volta che, attraverso gli Scatter, si ha l’accesso ai giri gratuiti, gli stessi simboli Scatter, le tre Caravelle, diventano anche Wild, e sono dunque sostituibili, aumentando così le possibilità di vincita.
Ciascuna vincita inoltre può essere massimizzata grazie alla funzione Gamble, con la quale si può tentare il raddoppio: sulla schermata appare una mano di carte e il giocatore dovrà indovinare il colore di quella che verrà girata per vedere moltiplicata la sua puntata.
È disponibile anche una funzione Autoplay un po’ particolare: non è necessario impostare prima il numero dei giri, ma è sufficiente far partire il gioco con il pulsante “automatico” e cliccare invece su “stop” quando si vuole passare di nuovo alla modalità manuale.
Conclusioni
Pur non rappresentando una novità assoluta ma solo una versione migliorata di una slot già esistente, Columbus Deluxe si è rinnovata soprattutto per quanto riguarda la versatilità del gioco. Come il suo predecessore, mantiene la possibilità di spaziare da puntate molto basse a scommesse piuttosto consistenti (20 €), tuttavia l’offerta di gioco è nettamente superiore, con l’inserimento di funzionalità nuove e coinvolgenti.
Slot simili
Il tema delle scoperte e delle esplorazioni è stato ampiamente sviluppato nell’ambito delle slot machine da parte di diverse software house.
Playtech, per esempio, propone la slot The Discovery, in cui ad accompagnarci nell’esperienza di gioco sono Il Capitano e un’indigena della terra scoperta.
Molto suggestiva è anche Lucky Eggsplores della Microgaming, in cui i simboli tematici sono rappresentati da una goletta, il timone e l’immancabile mappa!

raw_translation.response:
"Columbus Deluxe" is a five-reel, ten-payline slot game developed by Novomatic. As an experienced gambler, you'll appreciate that the minimum bet is only €0.2 while high rollers can wager as much as €20. This game offers a maximum jackpot of €100,000 with a single coin and also features an Autoplay function.

The graphics in this game are modern, yet traditional symbols like the cards from 9 to Ace retain their charm. The Wild symbol is represented by Christopher Columbus himself, providing ample opportunities for big payouts. Landing on the Columbus symbol more than once will unlock multipliers that can lead to the maximum jackpot win. Additionally, the three Caravels represent the Scatter symbol which allows players to activate the Bonus Free Spins feature.

In Columbus Deluxe, each symbol has a value, and payouts range from cards to royalties. The use of the Gamble function can help players maximize their potential winnings. And as an added bonus, players can access an Autoplay function to enjoy the game hands-free.

Although not an entirely new concept, Columbus Deluxe provides an enhanced version of classic slot machine games. With the inclusion of new features and functionalities, this game is more versatile than its predecessor. Similar slot machines such as "The Discovery" from Playtech and "Lucky Eggsplores" from Microgaming are also worth checking out.

"Columbus Deluxe" is a five-reel, ten-payline slot game developed by Novomatic. As an experienced gambler, you'll appreciate that the minimum bet is only €0.2 while high rollers can wager as much as €20. The graphics in this game are modern, yet traditional symbols like the cards from 9 to Ace retain their charm. The Wild symbol is represented by Christopher Columbus himself, providing ample opportunities for big payouts. Additionally, the three Caravels represent the Scatter symbol which allows players to activate the Bonus Free Spins feature.

raw_translation.response:
Columbus Deluxe is a top-notch slot game developed by Novomatic, with a fresh outlook on the classic Columbus slot machine. Players set sail on a journey of discovery across the ocean, in search of hidden treasures and bonuses. The graphics are exceptional, blending modern features with classic elements found in traditional land-based slot machines, such as the poker symbols. 

The game symbols revolve around the exploration of the New World, featuring Queen Isabella of Spain, the explorer's three caravels, a golden necklace and a ship's mast, along with the usual poker symbols. The Wild symbol is the image of Christopher Columbus himself, which not only replaces other symbols, but when appearing multiple times, can offer lucrative multipliers, resulting in a potential jackpot of €100,000 if it appears five times on a single payline. 

The caravels are the Scatter symbols, which activate the Free Spins bonus game, while the Gamble feature offers players the chance to double their winnings. Each symbol has a different value, ranging from the lower-paying poker symbols to higher-paying symbols like Queen Isabella of Aragon and Christopher Columbus. When the Caravel Scatters appear during Free Spins, they also become Wild, allowing for even more winning opportunities. 

Columbus Deluxe offers flexible bet options, with the opportunity to strike big with low or high bets up to €20 per spin. The Autoplay function adds to the experience, allowing players to enjoy a truly hands-free journey while still remaining engaged with the thrill of the game. 

In conclusion, while not entirely groundbreaking, Columbus Deluxe has improved significantly in terms of gameplay options and added features. There are similar slots like Playtech's The Discovery and Microgaming's Lucky Eggsplores that cater to the exploration theme, but Columbus Deluxe stands out as a great game for the experienced gambler who loves a mix of traditional and modern elements.

message.content:
Columbus Deluxe is a top-notch slot game developed by Novomatic, with a fresh outlook on the classic Columbus slot machine. Players set sail on a journey of discovery across the ocean, in search of hidden treasures and bonuses. The graphics are exceptional, blending modern features with classic elements found in traditional land-based slot machines, such as the poker symbols. 

The game symbols revolve around the exploration of the New World, featuring Queen Isabella of Spain, the explorer's three caravels, a golden necklace and a ship's mast, along with the usual poker symbols. The Wild symbol is the image of Christopher Columbus himself, which not only replaces other symbols, but when appearing multiple times, can offer lucrative multipliers, resulting in a potential jackpot of €100,000 if it appears five times on a single payline. 

The caravels are the Scatter symbols, which activate the Free Spins bonus game, while the Gamble feature offers players the chance to double their winnings. Each symbol has a different value, ranging from the lower-paying poker symbols to higher-paying symbols like Queen Isabella of Aragon and Christopher Columbus. When the Caravel Scatters appear during Free Spins, they also become Wild, allowing for even more winning opportunities. 

Columbus Deluxe offers flexible bet options, with the opportunity to strike big with low or high bets up to €20 per spin. The Autoplay function adds to the experience, allowing players to enjoy a truly hands-free journey while still remaining engaged with the thrill of the game. 

In conclusion, while not entirely groundbreaking, Columbus Deluxe has improved significantly in terms of gameplay options and added features. There are similar slots like Playtech's The Discovery and Microgaming's Lucky Eggsplores that cater to the exploration theme, but Columbus Deluxe stands out as a great game for the experienced gambler who loves a mix of traditional and modern elements.

response.headline: Game features and symbols
response.content: Columbus Deluxe is an online slot game designed by Novomatic that takes players on a journey of exploration in search of hidden treasures and rewards. The symbols revolve around the theme of exploring the New World, featuring the adventurer himself, Christopher Columbus, in addition to his three caravels, the queen of Aragon, the ship's mast, a golden necklace, and traditional poker symbols. The Wild symbol is represented by Christopher Columbus, while the caravels represent the Scatter symbols. The game also features a Gamble feature that offers players the chance to double their winnings.

response.headline: Graphics and design
response.content: Columbus Deluxe boasts exceptional graphics that perfectly blend classic and modern elements. The game features vivid colors, stunning animations, and high-quality audio, making it an exciting and immersive gaming experience. The symbols and backdrop of the game perfectly capture the spirit of exploration, with the backdrop and symbols designed to give the player a feel of the ocean and the adventure of exploration.

response.headline: Bet options and flexibility
response.content: Columbus Deluxe offers flexible bet options and payouts that cater to different player budgets. Players can choose to bet as low as €0.10 per spin, while high rollers can go up to €20 per spin. The game's flexible betting options allow players to enjoy the game irrespective of their budget. The game also offers an Autoplay feature that provides a fully hands-free experience, allowing players to sit back and watch the results unfold.

response.headline: Bonus features (Free Spins and Gamble)
response.content: Columbus Deluxe features two bonus features - Free Spins and Gamble. The Free Spins feature is triggered by landing three or more Caravel Scatter symbols. Players are initially awarded 10 free spins, during which the Caravel symbols become Wild and the chances of landing winning combinations are considerably higher. The Gamble feature allows players to double their winnings by selecting the correct color of the next card to be drawn from a deck. Players can keep playing the Gamble feature until they reach the maximum limit or guess incorrectly.

response.headline: Autoplay function
response.content: The Autoplay function in Columbus Deluxe allows players to sit back and enjoy the game, without the need for manual spinning. Players can customize their gameplay experience, with options to set their number of spins, loss limits, and win limits. The Autoplay function also allows players to keep track of their progress and earnings, providing a sense of control even though the game is running automatically.

Review: Columbus Deluxe is a top-notch slot game developed by Novomatic, with a fresh outlook on the classic Columbus slot machine. Players set sail on a journey of discovery across the ocean, in search of hidden treasures and bonuses. The graphics are exceptional, blending modern features with classic elements found in traditional land-based slot machines, such as the poker symbols. 

The game symbols revolve around the exploration of the New World, featuring Queen Isabella of Spain, the explorer's three caravels, a golden necklace and a ship's mast, along with the usual poker symbols. The Wild symbol is the image of Christopher Columbus himself, which not only replaces other symbols, but when appearing multiple times, can offer lucrative multipliers, resulting in a potential jackpot of €100,000 if it appears five times on a single payline. 

The caravels are the Scatter symbols, which activate the Free Spins bonus game, while the Gamble feature offers players the chance to double their winnings. Each symbol has a different value, ranging from the lower-paying poker symbols to higher-paying symbols like Queen Isabella of Aragon and Christopher Columbus. When the Caravel Scatters appear during Free Spins, they also become Wild, allowing for even more winning opportunities. 

Columbus Deluxe offers flexible bet options, with the opportunity to strike big with low or high bets up to €20 per spin. The Autoplay function adds to the experience, allowing players to enjoy a truly hands-free journey while still remaining engaged with the thrill of the game. 

In conclusion, while not entirely groundbreaking, Columbus Deluxe has improved significantly in terms of gameplay options and added features. There are similar slots like Playtech's The Discovery and Microgaming's Lucky Eggsplores that cater to the exploration theme, but Columbus Deluxe stands out as a great game for the experienced gambler who loves a mix of traditional and modern elements.

response.headline: Graphics and Design
response.content:
Columbus Deluxe is as visually impressive as an online slot game can be. It's like owning a window to another world, where you're transported back to the days of Christopher Columbus. The graphics are so good you can almost smell the sea breeze and hear the ocean waves.

The graphics of Columbus Deluxe are so good that you'll forget you're not actually exploring the high seas! Just don't get too caught up in the graphics, or you could end up walking the plank (or worse, losing all your money...).

response.headline: Bonus Features: Free Spins and Gamble
response.content:
If you are looking for some excitement while playing online slots, Columbus Deluxe has got you covered! This game features two incredible bonus features - Free Spins and Gamble. And let me tell you, these bonuses will make you feel like you've hit the jackpot, even if you haven't!

The Free Spins feature is triggered by landing three or more Caravel Scatter symbols. And oh boy, once you trigger it, you are in for a treat! You will be awarded with 10 free spins, and during this time, the Caravel symbols become Wild. This means that you'll have a much higher chance of landing winning combinations. I mean, who doesn't love free spins, right?

But wait, there's more! The Gamble feature in Columbus Deluxe allows you to double your winnings by simply selecting the correct color of the next card to be drawn from a deck. It's like playing a mini-game within a game! However, make sure not to get too greedy. You can choose to keep playing and increasing your winnings, but be careful: one wrong guess and you'll lose everything! You don't want to be that person who lost all their winnings on one bad guess, do you?

In conclusion, the Bonus Features in Columbus Deluxe add an extra layer of excitement to an already thrilling game. Trust me, you won't be disappointed when you trigger these bonuses. So what are you waiting for? Give Columbus Deluxe a spin and see if luck is on your side!

Review:
 
Game features and symbols

Columbus Deluxe is an online slot game designed by Novomatic that takes players on a journey of exploration in search of hidden treasures and rewards. The symbols revolve around the theme of exploring the New World, featuring the adventurer himself, Christopher Columbus, in addition to his three caravels, the queen of Aragon, the ship's mast, a golden necklace, and traditional poker symbols. Columbus Deluxe offers flexible bet options and payouts that cater to different player budgets. Players can choose to bet as low as €0.10 per spin, while high rollers can go up to €20 per spin. Bonus features (Free Spins and Gamble)

Columbus Deluxe features two bonus features - Free Spins and Gamble. The Free Spins feature is triggered by landing three or more Caravel Scatter symbols. Players are initially awarded 10 free spins, during which the Caravel symbols become Wild and the chances of landing winning combinations are considerably higher. The Gamble feature allows players to double their winnings by selecting the correct color of the next card to be drawn from a deck. Players can keep playing the Gamble feature until they reach the maximum limit or guess incorrectly.

Autoplay function

The Autoplay function in Columbus Deluxe allows players to sit back and enjoy the game, without the need for manual spinning. Players can customize their gameplay experience, with options to set their number of spins, loss limits, and win limits. The Autoplay function also allows players to keep track of their progress and earnings, providing a sense of control even though the game is running automatically.

faq.question: What is Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: Columbus Deluxe is a top-notch slot game developed by Novomatic, with a fresh outlook on the classic Columbus slot machine.

faq.question: What is the theme of Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: The theme of the game revolves around the exploration of the New World, featuring Queen Isabella of Spain and the explorer's three caravels, amongst other symbols.

faq.question: What are the Wild and Scatter symbols in Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: The Wild symbol is the image of Christopher Columbus himself, while the caravels are the Scatter symbols.

faq.question: What is the potential jackpot in Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: If the Wild symbol appears five times on a single payline, the potential jackpot is €100,000.

faq.answer: The Gamble feature offers players the chance to double their winnings.

faq.answer: The Autoplay function adds to the experience, allowing players to play hands-free while still remaining engaged with the thrill of the game.

faq.answer: Players have the opportunity to bet up to €20 per spin.

faq.question: Is Columbus Deluxe suitable for experienced gamblers?
faq.answer: Yes, Columbus Deluxe stands out as a great game for the experienced gambler who loves a mix of traditional and modern elements.

Review: Columbus Deluxe is a top-notch slot game developed by Novomatic, with a fresh outlook on the classic Columbus slot machine. Players set sail on a journey of discovery across the ocean, in search of hidden treasures and bonuses. The graphics are exceptional, blending modern features with classic elements found in traditional land-based slot machines, such as the poker symbols. 

The game symbols revolve around the exploration of the New World, featuring Queen Isabella of Spain, the explorer's three caravels, a golden necklace and a ship's mast, along with the usual poker symbols. The Wild symbol is the image of Christopher Columbus himself, which not only replaces other symbols, but when appearing multiple times, can offer lucrative multipliers, resulting in a potential jackpot of €100,000 if it appears five times on a single payline. 

The caravels are the Scatter symbols, which activate the Free Spins bonus game, while the Gamble feature offers players the chance to double their winnings. Each symbol has a different value, ranging from the lower-paying poker symbols to higher-paying symbols like Queen Isabella of Aragon and Christopher Columbus. When the Caravel Scatters appear during Free Spins, they also become Wild, allowing for even more winning opportunities. 

Columbus Deluxe offers flexible bet options, with the opportunity to strike big with low or high bets up to €20 per spin. The Autoplay function adds to the experience, allowing players to enjoy a truly hands-free journey while still remaining engaged with the thrill of the game. 

In conclusion, while not entirely groundbreaking, Columbus Deluxe has improved significantly in terms of gameplay options and added features. There are similar slots like Playtech's The Discovery and Microgaming's Lucky Eggsplores that cater to the exploration theme, but Columbus Deluxe stands out as a great game for the experienced gambler who loves a mix of traditional and modern elements.
